## Making a table

```{r}
options(pillar.sigfig = 2)
lipidomics %>%
  group_by(metabolite) %>%
  summarise(
    across(
      value,
      list(
        mean = mean,
        sd = sd
      )
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(across(
    where(is.numeric),
    \(x) round(x, digits = 2)
  )) %>%
  mutate(MeanSD = glue::glue("{value_mean} ({value_sd})")) %>%
  select(Metabolite = metabolite, "Mean SD" = MeanSD)

#   knitr::kable()
```
